reviews.review_text:
Tanjore Restaurant continues to impress with its winning combination of great ambience, delicious food, and impeccable service. Known for bringing authentic South Indian flavors to life, it’s a must-visit for food enthusiasts.

Originally a favorite in Mumbai, Tanjore has now expanded to Goa, carrying its signature charm and culinary excellence to the coastal paradise. Whether you’re indulging in their classics or exploring new offerings, every dish promises to be a flavorful journey. Highly recommended for a memorable dining experience!

The  Tanjore Tiffin Room in Anjuna is a gem!The ambiance is stunning, with a beautifully restored Portuguese bungalow and lush surroundings that make for a serene dining experience. The food was fantastic—we tried the Chicken 65 and loved the unique curry tasting concept. The cocktails, especially the Garden Galatta and X & the Sour Equation, were excellent. The service was warm and attentive, adding to the overall experience. Highly recommend this place for authentic South Indian flavors and a great vibe in Goa!

When I travel, I usually prefer to explore the local cuisine rather than sticking to what I can easily find back home. Being from Chennai, I often avoid Tamil Nadu food when dining out in other places. However, my experience at Tanjore Tiffin Room in Goa was a delightful exception.
The food was exceptional, and I appreciated the detailed explanations provided for each type of gravy. It was a unique touch to be able to taste the gravies before making a choice, ensuring we picked exactly what suited our palates.
The ambiance added to the experience—the space is beautifully designed with vibrant, colorful interiors that create a welcoming atmosphere. The attention to detail is evident, from the classy cutlery to the overall decor, making it a memorable dining destination.
